features: INSTANT GENEROUS HAIR VOLUME ROOT LIFT SPRAY - Instant volume powder and texture spray for hair - A very simple and effective solution to lift your hair in a second for a strong hair volume all day long.
BREATHTAKING VOLUME AND TEXTURE POWDER - Hair texture powder that gives volume even on fine hair or slick hair. We are confident that you will be charmed and won over by its effectiveness.
A PLAYFUL VANILLA GOURMAND FRAGRANCE - Will give to your hair treatment an exquisite and gentle moment

EASY TO USE - Apply at the roots from 5-10 cm, gently massage in. It's ready. Apply an amount taking into account the thickness and length of the hair. For all hair types. Controlled dosage thanks to the pump dispenser. Shake lightly during use for optimal application. For added texture, apply from 10-15 cm away from the hair.
FOR ALL HAIR TYPES - Adjust the amount of powder to spray at the root, and whether you have fine or thick hair, long or short, straight, curly, frizzy, or wavy, you'll achieve the desired volume!

CONTROLLED DOSAGE - Thanks to the pump dispenser, you can easily control the amount of powder applied to the hair, depending on its thickness and length. Shake gently during use to achieve a fine powdery mist.
description: Product Description MONÉ Professional Volumizing & Texturizing Powder Adds texture and grip to buns, ponytails, and up-dos. Creates fullness and light hold in pixies and shorter cuts, and long-lasting lift and volume in longer styles. This talc-free volumizing powder also features a spray nozzle for easy, mess-free application. MONÉ PROFESSIONAL Instant Volume Hair Powders: Elevate Your Hair in a Flash Enhance Your Look with Glittering Volume and Luxurious Texture! Boost your locks with MONÉ PROFESSIONAL's Instant Volume Hair Powders! Achieve sky-high volume in a flash, even on the finest of hair. Infused with a delightful vanilla gourmand scent, this easy-to-use spray ensures a controlled dose with its precision pump, suitable for all hair types. Whether you have straight, curly, or wavy tresses, just a light shake and spray from the right distance will give you that salon-fresh volume that lasts all day. Elevate your hair game effortlessly! Provides Instant Volume Adds Texture to Each Strand of Hair Long-Lasting Super Hold Choose your hair powder, with our without slightly shimmering effect. Universal or for dar hair. Add Luscious Volume to Your Hair This texturizing powder is designed to provide added volume and thickness to your hair without leaving any sticky or greasy residue. The lightweight formula ensures a natural, weightless feel, allowing you to style your hair as desired. Say goodbye to stickiness while enjoying the benefits of thicker, more voluminous hair with this non-sticky hair thickening powder. Fancy a hair game-changer? This might just be your jam! Struggling to achieve that salon-worthy volume on fine hair? MONÉ PROFESSIONAL's Instant Volume Hair Powder effortlessly lifts and volumises even the finest of locks for a full-bodied look. Are you tired of hair products that leave an overpowering scent? This hair powder delights with a playful vanilla gourmand fragrance, offering both style and a gentle aromatic experience. Worried about over-applying or wasting products? With its precision pump dispenser, you can easily control the amount, ensuring optimal application every time, regardless of hair type or length.
